website_summaries.verdict: These high-quality adult wipes deliver an unmatched combination of softness, durability, and size.
pros: Extra large wipes are much bigger than many comparable options
Enriched with aloe vera to help rejuvenate the skin
Thick wipes won't fall apart easily
cons: Tend to be more expensive than similar options

customer_reviews.title: Truck Driver that uses these in the truck for just about everything.
customer_reviews.text: If I stay in the truck overnight, perfect for a bum's bath. If I get grease all over me, cleans it up easily. If my dash or door gets dirty, yep, works great. These are big and strong and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: big
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE VERY BIG AND HAVE ALOT OF JUICE TO THEM , SO THEY LAST FOR A WHILE WITHOUT DRYING OUT TO SOON , I WILL BUY MORE WHEN NEEDED .
customer_reviews.author: Rosy F.

customer_reviews.title: roll up easily in your hand
customer_reviews.text: Too thin, roll up easily in your hand. If you are looking for a thick wipe with ample liquid in each cloth, I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: BBGator

customer_reviews.title: Large and durable
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are very large and rugged. They do not tear or shred like some of the other wipes I have tried. This was my second order. I will continue to purchase them until they improve them to oblivion like most manufacturers try to do.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great when traveling
customer_reviews.text: These work very well especially when traveling. Nice size and feel refreshed after using. I have bought this product several times and plan to continue.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I go camping lots in which I try to save on the water in my travel trailer. These help keep me clean so I don't shower as often.
customer_reviews.author: Papabear

customer_reviews.title: Great for big bodies
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these for my disabled brother who is quite large. I've tried other brands, but none were as durable AND large enough to do the job. He feels clean and refreshed and that's a boost to his self-esteem. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cescasf

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: Very large to fit my large hands and does what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: ShinMadman3rd

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I could not get past the sickly sweet baby powder smell and threw these away; would have rated higher without it. While these do just as good a job as others I've tried, are decently thick, and leave no sticky residue, they tend to roll up while you're trying to wipe with a flat hand, making them slightly annoying to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Washcloths!
customer_reviews.text: Work Great with or without water LIKE REALLY GREAT DIRTY SKIN GRABBERS!!!! pros excellent cleaning ability, value for money, size of cloths, definitely leaves your skin feeling clean. cons- when wet they become translucent- now I understand that these are for WITHOUT water but I use them with water n tea tree oil soap. Still an awesome product even when I don't use with water. surprisingly this is the only thing that really gets my feet really really clean n nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pastry, Fitness & Life!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to anyone who is unable to bathe in a more conventional manner.
customer_reviews.text: My 91 year old mother has a wound on her leg that can not get wet, therefor no showers. These wipes are a life saver! Large, very moist, durable- she’s been able to feel fresh and clean for over 6 weeks using these. Also, she had very sensitive skin- these wipes were perfect- no abrasions, no skin irritations, while getting the job done. Would highly recommend to anyone who is unable to bathe in a more conventional manner.
customer_reviews.author: Becca D

customer_reviews.title: You’re definitely getting more for your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other brands in the past, but these are by far the most durable, and effective brand that I’ve ever used. I am using less wipes to complete the job at hand than I was when using other brands. Wipes lasting longer equals less refills need to be purchased, resulting in more money in my pocket. Can’t beat that!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product multiple applications, lifts off goo.
customer_reviews.text: Big wipes for big jobs! They are not kidding about high traction. These wipes lift stuff right off you. Excellent applications for nursing homes, day care, post sexytime cleanup, makeup removal, or just a refresh between showers.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes and good value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different product of this type before and was satisfied with it. This brand I purchased currently has really exceeded my expectations! I will order again when I run out!!
customer_reviews.author: R. MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Fresh all day.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wipes. Leaves you feeling very refreshed. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Furbaby Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Like a long baby wipe
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for a thick, disposable wash cloth for use on my elderly parents. These aren’t it. These are long, like 6 sheets of toilet paper. The thickness is similar to Huggins. It’s not easy to double it up to wipe as it will slip. Basically this is a longer baby wipe. It has some purpose but it’s just not what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Camlyn305

customer_reviews.title: Been a life saver
customer_reviews.text: Great when you need to keep clean quick . Prostate cancer a must to have . 73 yrs old .
customer_reviews.author: Northsman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been searching for
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every bathing wipe I could find and these are the only ones I've used that don't wad up like a wet tissue. They have a good amount of grip where others just slip around on your skin and really do a great job cleaning. The only reasons I didn't give five stars is because they could be a little thicker and I'm not crazy about the fragrance - both I am willing to overlook to get this kind of quality..
customer_reviews.author: Nozmo King

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: great value for money!! great size for cleaning!! an wont break you out on your face !! love this product
customer_reviews.author: Aj  strong

customer_reviews.title: For a kid with a cast, this gets it done.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 4 year old, who has scoliosis and is in a torso cast. She doesn't get to take baths, so it's sponge bathing for her. These are perfect for keeping her clean without ruining the cast.
customer_reviews.author: Leya Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These smell great ang work better than other’s I have used. Great product and I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L Jones

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This product is large and sturdy to get the job perfectly. It says it is also free of parabens, alcohol & phthalates, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Light Wings

customer_reviews.title: large size
customer_reviews.text: I like the softness of the wipes and they are large in size. I wish they had more moisture. I bought them because my family member wasn't able to take a shower/bath after surgery for a while. They kept him clean till he could shower again. I use them to freshen up if I'm not able to shower. They are nice for traveling and keeping in the car to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukee

customer_reviews.title: A must to have
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice to have around when one needs a quick freshening. I have used thicker ones and loved those .these are not thick and they do tear but still are very good
customer_reviews.author: Amzl cust

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for the count. Being of a less price, they didn’t skimp on the quality. As described.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: very difficult to pull out of Of package.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Dad. we use them to help between showers, as he is handicapped. They are good size, soft and plenty of liquid cleaner. The problem is the dont pull out one after another and you have to dig them out of the package. Had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Em Steb

customer_reviews.title: Adult wipes
customer_reviews.text: Sheets needed to be slightly thicker. Used on my handicapped mom for disposable adult diaper changes. Overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for refreshing
customer_reviews.text: So good. Large enough to wash entire body. I will reorder
customer_reviews.author: Rawleyfing

customer_reviews.title: great quality and larger size.
customer_reviews.text: Used these with the wife after a triple bypass and it was the go to cleanup instead of using the hospital stuff which is much harsher. Each towel can easily be torn in half if the job isn't a big one. Great for people with sensitive skin or for long term usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They clean up a mess very well without falling apart. Soft but durable. I may have found the personal wipes for me.
customer_reviews.author: RuthF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: With limited mobility these wipes made it easy to clean myself and feel fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It is true what they say in the description....better than Sam's club brand. In my opinion it wipes up better than the Sam's brand. I tested it to wipe up my sticky sweaty neck after a walk and it worked well. Not sticky after wiping and smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Luke's Mom

customer_reviews.title: wipes
customer_reviews.text: I have repurchased this product several times. It is perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, nice larger size. Helped my husband after surgery. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alijazx

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are really good for my grandmother in the nursing home. They are thick and very large so they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried three different brands of disposable adult washcloths, and these are the BEST so far! The size is great, they’re durable and effectively clean. Can’t ask for better!
customer_reviews.author: DSheaBo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of these. They work great. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these wipes for the CNA's at my mother's nursing home to use. They love these, they work great and are soft on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Dressander

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were a tat bit thicker
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are good. They do not rip, but I still wish to wiping motion they were a tat bit thicker. Clean well without sticky or film feeling. Refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted To Amazon

customer_reviews.title: TP shortage supplement.
customer_reviews.text: With the big TP shortage we use the wipes to extend our supply of TP. They are working quite well and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Granala

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Strong scent can be a good thing or bad. Large and easy to work with. But does start to come apart like all of them do if over used.
customer_reviews.author: n3v45

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes and value
customer_reviews.text: Great unscented wipes and value . Packages have snap outter plastic lid and inner sealing so they stay moist. Nice large size
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wipes are only 7"x15" if you stretch it. They look like toilet paper off the roll. Way too thin for adult use without using more then one at a time and even then they just roll up in the hand. Not good for wiping the behind. I gave mine to someone with small children. I would not buy again nor do I recommend them. On the plus side, they have a good smell and good moisture.
customer_reviews.author: UnHappy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great price/ value.
customer_reviews.text: I drive truck, these are a life saver out here, tryed other brands love the size and the fact no lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and helpful
customer_reviews.text: These are thick and the perfect size for keeping clean.
customer_reviews.author: Unspoiled

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be thicker
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product needs to be thicker. As you wipe, the sheets roll and ball up, and you have to keep straightening them out to be able to use the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Scharbrough

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as I thought
customer_reviews.text: But they work good I just hoped they would be thicker than they are. I will probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my post op recovery after bbl. They are long and durable. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Keedy

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these for my father. They are a soft, thick wipe that work well. A bit on the pricey side, but, at 87 years old, dad deserves comfort and these wipes deliver.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: Does not have an overpowering smell. Fairly durable. Decent amount of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Mike 5

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. A bit big for my liking,but I still like them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand for my mother's personal care and I have to say they are the best I've ever tried. Great quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery during covid 19
customer_reviews.text: Thanks. Was surprised how fast delivery was during the covid 19 pandemic. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: OMGodz

customer_reviews.title: So clean!
customer_reviews.text: I like leaving cleaning towels conveniently around. They do the job and I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lady j

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick wipes
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and thickness is very good I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: BDiS

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant, clean smell. Tricky to use, because they try to roll up. Not a trustworthy, predictable material. Additionally, it caused skin break down :(
customer_reviews.author: R B.

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Product performed well. Great for a sponge bath when unable to use shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size Wipe for Adults
customer_reviews.text: I have these on auto delivery. The size is great for taking care of my son who is 26 yr old and has no self help skills. Have a pack in almost every room and in both vehicles. Been getting them for 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: A LeBPar

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to only use one so great deal for the money
customer_reviews.author: vicki cohan

customer_reviews.title: Large Clothes
customer_reviews.text: Covers a large area, but wish that each would pull another out with it to prevent having to reach inside
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Best of it’s kind.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than most personal washcloths. Very soft and refreshing, but also substantial and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret P Towery

customer_reviews.title: Very thin.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and stretchy. Need to use two at a time and still doesn't perform well.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Stay clean while camping.
customer_reviews.text: While backpacking, I still resist the stink rather than embrace it. These are essential for continuing to feel like a human. I just wish that the sheets wouldn’t grip each other so much when trying to pull them from the package.
customer_reviews.author: The Analyst

customer_reviews.title: I needed large and these are definitely large!
customer_reviews.text: They are XlL and will work well - love them!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and thick!
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and well worth the price. We are both very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Arrives at the house like clockwork.
customer_reviews.author: Hey, I bought this !

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like because they get rid of messes and odors.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond 222233

customer_reviews.title: Proper pooper scooper
customer_reviews.text: After toiling with store brand baby wipes, finding these allowed for a fresher, cleaner butt on my end. In a pinch, one of these napkins will serve as a quick shower substitute. Just wipe your soppy bits and your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: David Medina

customer_reviews.title: Not very good or worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy citronella xl wipes but they are not in stock. These are not as wet or moist. Definitely won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lIsa Hertz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality product. Rolls up too easily. Really annoying. Maybe for some people, but I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JT Windom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great size closes back perfect holds the moisture. So far so good.Grea
customer_reviews.author: Trucker Gee

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled person. I like these wipes. My nurse uses them on my lady parts. They smell good and clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my 93 year old bedridden mom. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as the ones I’m used to but work just as great.
customer_reviews.author: JYusuf

customer_reviews.title: Not thick!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are not thick at all. They are just like baby wipes except larger. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John & Renee Williams

customer_reviews.title: 😃
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my elderly father. He says they are great! Loves the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: These have a STRONG fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: And it cost more money in TIME to return then to just keep them. So I’m stuck with it. But be ware... they are scented.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Power

customer_reviews.title: you can't find better
customer_reviews.text: grate for wapping face and all parts of your body
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Durable....pleasant smell...dont need as many to get the job done...
customer_reviews.author: sharon t

customer_reviews.title: A good value!
customer_reviews.text: The wipes stand up strongly so you get the job done with one wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, but price increase was too much!
customer_reviews.text: I really think these worked well and I didn’t mind the smell. Sadly the price increased, about $10.00, so I’m going with a different, cheaper brand for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying these for a year or more and haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: great sanitizing wipes
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, sostnass and durability of these wipes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are a bigger wipe.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were more square shape. But I like them because they are bigger. Being used on adults. Home health type setting.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: one of the best adult wipes on the market. great for Incontinence
customer_reviews.text: while marketed as washcloths these are a great item to use for incontinence cleanups as well. actually working better than some that are marketed for that purpose. not sure about uber thick but they are thicker than most on the market. would recommend these for incontinence
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do the job, but could be thicker.
customer_reviews.text: These do clean well, but they are just thin enough to tear easily when pulling from the container. The fragrance is okay. I think it would be better if they had smaller packages with fewer cloths. You do get clean, but I think I will be very tired of them by the time they're used up.
customer_reviews.author: -SAN.

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st time experience and product
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering and one box of my 3 cases order did not show up so I contacted them. They were quick to rectify the situation which I was pleased and pleased with their customer service. Very pleased with the product as well. The cloths are thick and stretchy so you may pull on the cloth to make it larger but it in no way weakens the structure of the cloth. They are strong and soft. I will be reordering, when the time comes to restock. Thank you for a pleasant product and customer service experience.
customer_reviews.author: Parrot parents

customer_reviews.title: and one of the side effects of my treatment was a very bad case of colitis
customer_reviews.text: I am a cancer patient, and one of the side effects of my treatment was a very bad case of colitis. These wipes are excellent for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Max D.

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Best adult wipes I’ve purchased. These wipes are amazing. I purchased them for a camping trip and loved the size and quality of these wipes. You can literally rinse it and ring it without it tearing like most wipes would tear. Pretty large in size. Love them. I keep repurchasing this product and also throw a pack in my gym bag for a “wipe clean down” once I’m done with my gym sesh. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Best shower wipes I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: When a shower is impractical or impossible, these shower wipes are a godsend. My husband broke his leg and couldnt get his brace wet. Sometimes we would Get the whole garbage bag and tape going but it just wasnt worth it even though he sweats like no ones business. These wipes got us through. They are also great on a hot day of hard work to wipe down real quick before lunch or a break. Best shower wipes ive tried! They are soft, effective, and actually pretty large compared to a lot of others!
customer_reviews.author: Robin W.

customer_reviews.title: Smells just like a baby wipe
customer_reviews.text: Other people put it in their reviews, but I was drawn into the price-per-Unit... they smell just like a baby wipe, which I was hoping would be less pungent, but it’s there. I didn’t do enough research, but if you hate the smell like me, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Love size, use multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size. I thought it was a good value compared to the competition: 224 total wipes for about $23. I used these multipurpose to cleanse myself and disinfectant, clean surfaces, as barrier too. I learned that one must careful of surfaces, the alcohol might have effect on some surfaces. They are very handy during this extra cleaning and sanitizing time in the age or post COVID-19. I ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: sar

customer_reviews.title: NOT FLUSHABLE - thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when I couldn’t find TP anywhere at the start of the pandemic. They are not flushable and that’s not clear when you’re buying them. As I’d prefer not to have poop covered towels just chilling in my trash can I’ll be using these as hand wipes or maybe I’ll just give them to a friend with a baby. They also kinda smell like old people.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Decent wipes. Best size I have found
customer_reviews.text: I do like these very much. We have a very specific need for these in our home with a soon to be 8 year old Autistic child who is still in potty training. I was frustrated using typical wipes which are clearly designed for babies. We use way less wipes, and these are strong. I have purchased 3 to 4 so called XL wipes and none of them compare to these in size. They are the best I have found. I can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Short term not long term use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father. He is in assisted living and needs these products foe cleanliness. Compared to other similar products this one was not as moist or durable for his needs. They maybe good short term but if constantly used a product that offers more moisture to protect the skin would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Whogrl21

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Like these wipes and pleased with the XL size as compared to Charmin's XL wipes that are only XL if the user is a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jeryl Metz, Books

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have these for emergencies.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, moist, durable. When the water cuts off have a backup-choose these. Going to be great for camping or as toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: P36jet

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Thesecwipes smell great. Helped to clean my mom really well. My dad loves using these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my mom, who is confined to bed. The package lasts longer than the ones I used to buy, so I don't need to buy as often. Just wish they made them a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Lablueeyes

customer_reviews.title: PAID FOR
customer_reviews.text: Parents love them. tough to get info out of elderly people so not much i can say.
customer_reviews.author: indymojo

product_meta.title: Premium Formulations HIGH Traction XL UBER Thick Adult Wipes Wash Cloths, Large, Strong (4 Packs x 56 Wipes = 224 Wipes)
product_meta.description: Size:56 Count (Pack of 4)Premium Formulation High Traction XL Wash Cloth are one of the highest performing wash cloths in the market with Its effective formula and specially engineered cloth.
feature_bullets: HIGH TRACTION WASH CLOTHS WITH ENHANCED WIPING AND LIFTING PERFORMANCE that out preforms Members Mark
MOST PREMIUM ADULT WASH CLOTHS IN THE MARKET - UBER SOFT, THICK , & EXTRA LARGE
FORMULATED MILD & EFFECTIVE CLEANSING FORMULA & SPECIALLY ENGINEERED CLOTH Xl - BEST CLEANSING TRACTION IN ANY ADULT WIPE IN THE MARKET
Enriched wtih ALOE VERA to NOURISH SKIN
100% GUARANTEED OR MONEY BACK!! We are that confident about our product
